course_description: This course explores the roles and authority of women in the early church (first to fourth centuries) and the ways this history is used in modern arguments about women's leadership. (Race, Ethnicity, and Gender)
schedule_location: Th 2:30pm-5:30pm in Rita Anne Rollins Building_549
